items.quote: Tenten's GEO strategy helped us become the go-to source for AI search results in our industry. Our qualified leads increased by 200%.
items.author: Sarah Chen
items.title: CMO at TechFlow

items.quote: Within 3 months, we were being cited in ChatGPT responses for our key topics. The ROI has been incredible.
items.author: Marcus Rodriguez
items.title: Founder, DataVault

items.question: What is Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)?
items.answer: GEO is the practice of optimizing content to be discovered, understood, and cited by AI-powered search engines and chatbots like ChatGPT, Claude, Google AI, and Perplexity.

items.question: How is GEO different from traditional SEO?
items.answer: While SEO focuses on ranking in search results, GEO optimizes for being featured in AI-generated answers and responses. It requires different content structures, citation strategies, and technical approaches.

items.question: Which AI platforms do you optimize for?
items.answer: We optimize for all major AI platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, Microsoft Copilot, and emerging generative search engines.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: Most clients see initial improvements in AI citations within 4-6 weeks, with significant results typically achieved within 3 months of consistent implementation.

items.question: Can GEO work alongside my existing SEO strategy?
items.answer: Absolutely! GEO complements traditional SEO. We ensure your content performs well in both traditional search engines and AI-powered platforms.
